title: log4net.dll old version
author: rocketmole
body_snippet:
<!--- Provide a general summary of the issue in the Title above -->
log4net.dll is an old version. Need to upgrade to 2.0.15 
## Expected Behavior
<!--- If you're describing a bug, tell us what should happen -->
<!--- If you're suggesting a change/improvement, tell us how it should work -->

## Current Behavior
<!--- If describing a bug, tell us what happens instead of the expected behavior -->

...

comments.snippet:
Please have a look at https://github.com/mRemoteNG/mRemoteNG/issues/2299#issuecomment-1285060808 to remediate it immediately until there is a stable release 1.77.x; https://github.com/mRemoteNG/mRemoteNG/issues/2019 describes the development status in general regarding this issue.
The nightly and preview version have it fixed.

Documentation of the workaround can be found here: https://mremoteng.readthedocs.io/en/v1.77.3-dev/known_issues.html#log4net-vulnerability-cve-2018-1285-mremoteng-vers...
comments.author: simonai1254

comments.snippet: Sorry. What version are more stable? nightly or preview?
comments.author: rocketmole

comments.snippet:
It's stable > preview > nightly (developer build). Right now I personally recommend to use 1.77.2-nb which has it fixed but not the saving limitations of 1.77.3-nb. 
Have a look at the releases: https://github.com/mRemoteNG/mRemoteNG/releases
comments.author: simonai1254
